column1: Hermione has a double-sided head. On one side she has a slight smile and on other is a scared expression. She has medium length brown hair. She is in her Hogwarts jacket and scarf. She has short black legs and a dark tan wand.

Professor Dumbledore has a double-sided head. On one side he is smiling and on the other side he has a neutral expression. He has long light grey hair and beard. He has printing on both sides of his torso and legs of his maroon robes. The detail on it is very good and looks great.

Professor Flitwick has a double-sided head. On one side he has a slight smile and on the other he is surprised. He has his classic brown hair and black bow tie. He has printing on both sides of his torso. He has printing of his suit. The detail is very good showing four buttons on it. He has short black legs and a brown wand.

Professor McGonagall has a single sided head. She has a smile as her expression.The detail on it does a nice job of showing wrinkles and making her appear old. She has a black witch hat. She has printing on both sides of her torso and legs. The detail shows her classic green robes. The detail is really good. She has a black wand.
